item.title: NPR sues Trump over executive order cutting federal funding
item.description: National Public Radio sued President Donald Trump over his executive order to cease all federal funding for the broadcaster.

item.title: Trump administration moves to cut rest of Harvard contracts with federal government
item.description: President Donald Trump in a social media post suggested taking $3 billion in frozen grant money to Harvard and and give it to trade schools.

item.title: Trump considers redirecting $3 billion in Harvard grants to U.S. trade schools
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday he is considering taking $3 billion of previously awarded grant money from Harvard and giving it to trade s...

item.title: France, Vietnam sign Airbus, satellite deals as Macron visits Hanoi
item.description: France and Vietnam signed a deal on Monday for 20 Airbus planes, among other pacts, as President Emmanuel Macron visited Hanoi.

item.title: Trump delays 50% tariffs on EU to July 9
item.description: President of the European Commission Ursula Von der Leyen said that she had a "good call" with Trump, but needed until July 9 to "reach a good deal."
